initial:
A video is connected to a html component using one of the following methods:
Konekti.media(id, media, type, src)
Konekti.video(id, type, src)
Konekti.mp4(id, src)
AttributeDescription
idHTML component to associate with the video
mediaMedia type (set to 'video' for videos)
typeVideo type
srcURL of the video
